info.name: Pink Visited Links for some sites
info.description:
Pink Visited Links for sites I use that don't distinguish visited links from normal links.

That's a dirty hack, but it does the job for me and I'm lazy.

Affected websites: 1377x.to, bedetheque.com, kitty-kats.net, nagy-dudak.blog.hu, onlyfullsets.com, oxtorrent, piratebay, pornleech.is, rarbgmirror, tvtropes.org, twitter.com, xhamster, yggtorrent.
